languages.text: "Несомненно, несомненно. Я и Футфол, мы оба — прекрасные примеры для поучительных притч о погоне за миражами".
"Most certainly. Footfall and I, we both serve as excellent warnings to those who would indulge their flights of fancy."
languages.original_text: "Несомненно, несомненно. Я и Футфол, мы оба — прекрасные примеры для поучительных притч о погоне за миражами".

traits.locale_text: "Most certainly. Footfall and I, we both serve as excellent warnings to those who would indulge their flights of fancy."

"Most certainly. Footfall and I, we both serve as excellent warnings to those who would indulge their flights of fancy."

languages.text: 「ええ、そのとおりです。フットフォールも私も、空想にふけろうとする人々に対する素晴らしい警告として役に立てるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Most certainly. Footfall and I, we both serve as excellent warnings to those who would indulge their flights of fancy."

traits.locale_text: 「ええ、そのとおりです。フットフォールも私も、空想にふけろうとする人々に対する素晴らしい警告として役に立てるでしょう」

languages.text: “一点都没错。对那些爱胡思乱想的人而言，落脚港也好，我也好，都会成为长鸣的警钟。”
languages.original_text: "Most certainly. Footfall and I, we both serve as excellent warnings to those who would indulge their flights of fancy."

traits.locale_text: “一点都没错。对那些爱胡思乱想的人而言，落脚港也好，我也好，都会成为长鸣的警钟。”

languages.text: «Desde luego. Paso y yo somos la advertencia ideal para todo aquel que pretenda recrearse en sus fantasías».
languages.original_text: "Most certainly. Footfall and I, we both serve as excellent warnings to those who would indulge their flights of fancy."

traits.locale_text: «Desde luego. Paso y yo somos la advertencia ideal para todo aquel que pretenda recrearse en sus fantasías».

languages.text: « En effet. Mon histoire et celle de Castel pourraient servir de mise en garde à ceux qui voudraient tirer des plans sur la comète. »
languages.original_text: "Most certainly. Footfall and I, we both serve as excellent warnings to those who would indulge their flights of fancy."

traits.locale_text: « En effet. Mon histoire et celle de Castel pourraient servir de mise en garde à ceux qui voudraient tirer des plans sur la comète. »

languages.text: "Mit Sicherheit. Footfall und ich sind ein ausgezeichnetes warnendes Beispiel für alle, die sich ihren Tagträumen hingeben."
languages.original_text: "Most certainly. Footfall and I, we both serve as excellent warnings to those who would indulge their flights of fancy."

traits.locale_text: "Mit Sicherheit. Footfall und ich sind ein ausgezeichnetes warnendes Beispiel für alle, die sich ihren Tagträumen hingeben."

languages.text: "Orası kesin. Binliman'la ben, hayallerinin peşinde koşma şımarıklığına kalkışacak herkes için uyarı niteliğindeyiz."
languages.original_text: "Most certainly. Footfall and I, we both serve as excellent warnings to those who would indulge their flights of fancy."

traits.locale_text: "Muhakkak. Hayallerinin peşinde koşma şımarıklığına kalkışmak isteyen herkes, Binliman'la benden ibret almalı."
